transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Phone cut gaya tha madam.
Executive: Haan ji ji awaz hi nahi aa rahi thi aapki isliye cut gaya tha. Aap video meeting maine schedule kari hai join to kariye ek bar.
Customer: Bhejo na.
Executive: Bhej diya maine link check karo.
Customer: Mail pe kara?
Executive: Haan aapke mail pe hi jaata hai jaise humne last time kiya tha waise hi hai.
Customer: Abhi dusri madam thi wapas aa gaye aap.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aap
summary:
Concerns:

- Phone got cut.

- Request to send the video meeting link.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the call was cut due to no voice.

- Executive scheduled a video meeting and sent the link to the customer's email.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Customer needs to check email and join the meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

call disconnection, video meeting, link
